translations.translation: When they are reminded they do not pay heed.
And when they are warned they pay no heed.
and when they are admonished, they pay no heed;
They pay no attention when they are reminded
And they do not understand, when explained to.
And when they are reminded, they pay no attention.
And when they are reminded, they mind not,
and, when reminded, do not remember
And heed not when they are reminded,
When they are reminded, they do not pay heed,
And when they are admonished, they receive not admcnition.
and [even] when admonished do not take admonition,
And, when they are admonished, pay no heed,-
And when they are reminded, they pay no attention.
When they are reminded, they do not remember.
And when reminded, they pay no attention.
And when they are reminded, they remember not.
[37:13] and [even] when they are reminded, [when] they are admonished with the Qur’ān, they are not mindful, they do not heed the admonition,
505 (And heed not) and take no admonition (when they are reminded) by the Qur'an,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: بل { وَ } هم من شدة قسوتهم وعمههم في سكرتهم { إِذَا ذُكِّرُواْ } ووعظوا بالإنذارات والتخويفات الشديدة المتعلقة للآخرة { لاَ يَذْكُرُونَ } [الصافات: 13] أي: لا يتأثرون ولا يتعظون

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ وإِذا ذُكِّروا لا يذْكُرون } أي: ودأبهم أنهم إذا وُعظوا بشيء لا يتعظون به
 { وإِذا رَأَوْا آيةً } معجزة
 كانشقاق القمر
 ونحوه
